install.name: YouTube.com
install.author: JomTube.com
install.license: This component in released under the GNU/GPL v2 or later license
install.description: Adds YouTube Video Link to JomTube

param.name: vidplayer
param.label: Select Video Player
param.description: Please Select One of The Options For Type of Video Player You Would Like Your Video To Be Played In

param.default: Youtube Player Options

param.name: ytfs
param.label: Show Full Screen Button
param.description: Enables Full Screen Button To the Player Bar

param.name: ythd
param.label: Make HD Default
param.description: Enables HD playback by default. This has no effect on the Chromeless Player. This also has no effect if an HD version of the video is not available.

param.name: ytautoplay
param.label: Auto Play Video
param.description: Sets whether or not the initial video will autoplay when the player loads.

param.name: ytshowinfo
param.label: Show Title On Video
param.description: Causes the player to not display information like the video title and rating before the video starts playing

param.name: ytref
param.label: Show Related Videos
param.description: Sets whether the player should load related videos once playback of the initial video starts.

param.name: ytshowsearch
param.label: Show Search Box
param.description: Default is 1. Setting to 0 disables the search box from displaying when the video is minimized. Note that if the rel parameter is set to 0 then the search box will also be disabled, regardless of the value of showsearch.

param.default: Set RGB Color Codes For Default Youtube Player:

param.name: ytshowborder
param.label: Show Player Border
param.description: Enables a border around the entire video player. The border's primary color can be set via the Border Color parameter, and the Background can be set by the Background color parameter.

param.name: ytcolor1
param.label: Border Color (RGB) Value
param.description: Enables HD playback by default. This has no effect on the Chromeless Player. This also has no effect if an HD version of the video is not available.

param.name: ytcolor2
param.label: Background Color (RGB) Value
param.description: Sets whether or not the initial video will autoplay when the player loads.

param.default: JW Player Parameters

param.name: controlbar
param.label: Control Bar Position
param.description: Position of the controlbar. Can be set to bottom, over and none

param.name: backcolor
param.label: Control Bar Color
param.description: The background color of the controlbar and playlist. This is white with the default skin.

param.name: frontcolor
param.label: Control Bar Text Color
param.description: The color of all icons and texts in the controlbar and playlist.

param.name: lightcolor
param.label: Control Bar Rollover
param.description: The color of an icon or text when you rollover it with the mouse. If you set this, also set the frontcolor, so the rollovers also have a rollout.

param.name: screencolor
param.label: Player Background Color
param.description: The background color of the display.

param.name: jwlogo
param.label: Display Logo
param.description: Location of a logo image.

param.name: jwautostart
param.label: Auto Start Video
param.description: Automatically start playing video when JW Player loads.

param.name: stretching
param.label: Stretching
param.description: defines how to resize images in the display. Can be none (no stretching), exactfit (disproportionate), uniform (stretch with black borders) or fill (uniform, but completely fill the display).

param.name: volume
param.label: Volume Setting
param.description: Startup volume of the player. Can be 0 to 100. Is saved in a cookie.

param.name: mute
param.label: Mute On Start
param.description: Mute the player on startup.

param.name: bufferlength
param.label: Buffer length
param.description: Number of seconds to buffer before starting.

param.name: jwlink
param.label: Link URL
param.description: Link to an external site.

param.name: linktarget
param.label: Link Target
param.description: Browser frame where link from the display are opened in. Some possibilities are '_self' (same frame) or '_blank' (new browserwindow).

param.name: displayclick
param.label: Display Click
param.description: Action to perform when you click the Video display. Can be play, link, fullscreen, none, mute, next. When set to none, the handcursor is also not shown.
